EmailTemplate.name: 2011_EMS_ACB3_Hershey.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Stop by and visit us at Next Week's XI - ABC3 Conference in Hershey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
October 25-27, 2011 | Hershey, PA Stop by Our Booth at the XI - ABC3 Conference Next Week!
Stop by and see us next week (October 25-27) at the Page, Wolfberg and Wirth Executive Institute (XI) and ABC3 Conference and visit with TriTech EMS Solutions Regional Sales Manager - Larry Cole, Industry Education Coordinator - Kathy Ransom and EMS Client Account Manager - Michele Duwe.
See a demo of our Sweet Billing, Fusion ePCR or VisiCAD solutions. We have options for online or installed applications.
Find out more about all the NAAC-Certified Webinar Recordings we offer to help your office improve their knowledge and skills, and get their CEUs! http://www.tritechems.com/TriTech-University/Webinars.asp
EMS industry experts predict that in the future, integrated, web-based EMS solutions will become the industry standard. TriTech offers these solutions NOW - read more here: http://www.tritechems.com/Products/online.asp
TriTech is proud to be a XI - ABC3 Conference Sponsor!
Can't make the conference in Hershey next week? Call Us at 800-537-3927
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121 | PH: 858.799.7000
